title: Son of the Preacher
overview: Jasmine, a whip-smart beauty entrepreneur, dreams of launching her own haircare brand but can’t seem to catch a break. Enter Caleb Samuel — a social-media-famous preacher’s kid with millions of followers, a fast car, and complicated family expectations. What starts as a strategic business move quickly becomes a connection that challenges them both to face love, purpose, and legacy in ways they never expected.
